languages.text: {n}Техножрец медлит с ответом, бросив взгляд на свои мехадендриты — будто советуясь с ними. Наконец его вокс-система изрекает:{/n} "Я прибыл ради исполнения священной миссии. Мой наставник, архимагос Амарнат, призвал меня, и я поспешил откликнуться. Но волнения черни помешали нашей встрече, и я направлялся к губернатору Медине, чтобы выяснить текущее местоположение моего владыки".

{n}The Tech-Priest hesitates, glancing at his mechadendrites as if consulting them. Eventually, his vox-system responds:{/n} "I came here to carry out a sacred mission. My mentor, Archmagos Amarnat, summoned me, and I hastened to answer his call. But the rabble's unrest prevented our meeting, and I was on my way to Governor Medineh to determine my mentor's current location."
languages.original_text: {n}Техножрец медлит с ответом, бросив взгляд на свои мехадендриты — будто советуясь с ними. Наконец его вокс-система изрекает:{/n} "Я прибыл ради исполнения священной миссии. Мой наставник, архимагос Амарнат, призвал меня, и я поспешил откликнуться. Но волнения черни помешали нашей встрече, и я направлялся к губернатору Медине, чтобы выяснить текущее местоположение моего владыки".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Tech-Priest hesitates, glancing at his mechadendrites as if consulting them. Eventually, his vox-system responds:{/n} "I came here to carry out a sacred mission. My mentor, Archmagos Amarnat, summoned me, and I hastened to answer his call. But the rabble's unrest prevented our meeting, and I was on my way to Governor Medineh to determine my mentor's current location."

{n}The Tech-Priest hesitates, glancing at his mechadendrites as if consulting them. Eventually, his vox-system responds,{/n} "I arrived to perform a mission assigned to me by my mentor, Archmagos Amarnat. It had been many cycles since we last communicated, and I experienced joy upon receiving word from him. But the rabble's unrest prevented our meeting, and I was on my way to Governor Medineh to determine my mentor's current location."

{n}The Tech-Priest hesitates, glancing at his mechadendrites as if consulting them. Eventually, his vox-system responds,{/n} "I arrived to perform a mission assigned to me by my mentor, Archmagos Amarnat. It had been many cycles since we last communicated, and I experienced joy upon receiving word from him. But the rabble's unrest prevented our meeting, and I was on my way to Governor Medineh to determine my mentor's current location."

But the rabble's unrest prevented our meeting, and I was on my way to Governor Medineh to determine my mentor's current location."

My mentor, Archmagos Amarnat, summoned me, and I hastened to answer his call. My mentor, Archmagos Amarnat, summoned me, and I hastened to answer his call. But the rabble's unrest prevented our meeting, and I was on my way to Governor Medineh to determine my mentor's current location."

languages.text: {n}技术神甫犹豫片刻，瞥了一眼他的机械触须，仿佛在询问它们的意见。到最后，他的音阵合成器中传来了答复。{/n}“我来这是里为了执行神圣的使命。我的导师阿玛纳特大贤者召唤了我，于是我立刻响应了他的召唤。我之前正打算赶往梅迪涅总督那边，确认我的导师当前的位置，但这群乌合之众的暴乱阻碍了我与总督的会面。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest hesitates, glancing at his mechadendrites as if consulting them. Eventually, his vox-system responds:{/n} "I came here to carry out a sacred mission. My mentor, Archmagos Amarnat, summoned me, and I hastened to answer his call. But the rabble's unrest prevented our meeting, and I was on my way to Governor Medineh to determine my mentor's current location."

traits.locale_text: {n}技术祭司犹豫片刻，瞥了一眼他的机械触须，仿佛在询问它们的意见。到最后，他的音阵合成器中传来了答复。{/n}“我是来这里执行任务的。这个任务是由我的导师阿玛纳特大贤者委派给我的，我上一次与他联系，已经是许多个周期前的事情了。能再次收到他的信息，我感到非常满足。我之前正打算赶往梅迪涅总督那边，确认我的导师当前的位置，但这群乌合之众的暴乱阻碍了我与总督的会面。”

languages.text: {n}El tecnosacerdote duda, lanzando una mirada a sus mecadendritas como si lo consultara con ellas. Finalmente, su sistema de voco responde.{/n} «Vine para ejecutar una misión sagrada. Mi mentor, el archimagos Amarnat, me hizo llamar y vine rápidamente a su encuentro. No obstante, los disturbios del populacho evitaron nuestro encuentro, por lo que me dirigía a hablar con el gobernador Medineh para determinar la ubicación actual de mi mentor».
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest hesitates, glancing at his mechadendrites as if consulting them. Eventually, his vox-system responds:{/n} "I came here to carry out a sacred mission. My mentor, Archmagos Amarnat, summoned me, and I hastened to answer his call. But the rabble's unrest prevented our meeting, and I was on my way to Governor Medineh to determine my mentor's current location."

traits.locale_text: {n}El tecnosacerdote duda, lanzando una mirada a sus mecadendritas como si lo consultara con ellas. Finalmente, su sistema de voco responde.{/n} «Vine para ejecutar una misión asignada por mi mentor, el archimagos Amarnat. Habían pasado muchos ciclos desde nuestro último contacto, y sentí satisfacción al recibir información de él. No obstante, los disturbios del populacho evitaron nuestro encuentro, por lo que me dirigía a hablar con el gobernador Medineh para determinar la ubicación actual de mi mentor».

languages.text: {n}技術司祭はためらい、相談でもするかのように機械触手をじっと見つめる。しばらくして、司祭のヴォクス・システムが応答する。{/n}「自分は神聖なる使命を果たすために来ました。師である大賢人アマルナトに呼び出され、急いで呼びかけに応じたのです。ですが、暴徒騒動で師との会談が叶わなくなってしまった。そのため、師の現在の居場所を突き止めるべくメディネ総督のところへ向かう途中だったのです」
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest hesitates, glancing at his mechadendrites as if consulting them. Eventually, his vox-system responds:{/n} "I came here to carry out a sacred mission. My mentor, Archmagos Amarnat, summoned me, and I hastened to answer his call. But the rabble's unrest prevented our meeting, and I was on my way to Governor Medineh to determine my mentor's current location."

traits.locale_text: {n}技術司祭は、相談するかのように機械触手をじっと見つめてためらっていたが、ようやく、司祭のヴォクス・システムが応答する。{/n}「我が師、大賢人アマルナトより授かりし使命を果たすために来た。最後に通信し、師のお言葉を賜り悦に入ってから何周期も経っていた。　私は神聖なる使命を果たすために来た。師である大賢人アマルナトに呼び出され、急いで呼びかけに応じたのだ。ところが、暴徒騒動で師との会談が叶わなくなってしまった。そこで、師の現在の居場所を突き止めるため、メディネ総督のところへ向かう途中だ」

languages.text: {n}Le technoprêtre hésite un instant, en jetant un coup d'œil à ses mécadendrites comme s'il les consultait. Son système-vox finit par répondre :{/n} « Je suis venu jusqu'ici pour accomplir une mission sacrée. Mon mentor, l'archimagos Amarnat, m'a convoqué et je me suis empressé de répondre à son appel. Cependant, les troubles provoqués par la populace ont empêché notre rencontre, et j'allais m'entretenir avec le gouverneur Medineh afin de déterminer où se trouve Amarnat actuellement. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest hesitates, glancing at his mechadendrites as if consulting them. Eventually, his vox-system responds:{/n} "I came here to carry out a sacred mission. My mentor, Archmagos Amarnat, summoned me, and I hastened to answer his call. But the rabble's unrest prevented our meeting, and I was on my way to Governor Medineh to determine my mentor's current location."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le technoprêtre hésite un instant, en jetant un coup d'œil à ses mécadendrites comme s'il les consultait. Son système-vox finit par répondre :{/n} « J'ai été envoyé ici en mission pour le compte de mon mentor, l'archimagos Amarnat. Après une absence de communication de plusieurs cycles, les nouvelles que j'ai récemment reçues de sa part m'ont procuré satisfaction. Cependant, les troubles provoqués par la populace ont empêché notre rencontre, et j'allais m'entretenir avec le gouverneur Medineh afin de déterminer où se trouve Amarnat actuellement. »

languages.text: {n}Der Techpriester zögert und blickt auf seine Mechadendriten, als würde er sie um Rat fragen. Schließlich antwortet sein Voxsystem:{/n} "Ich bin gekommen, um eine heilige Mission auszuführen. Mein Mentor, Erzmagos Amarnat, hat mich gerufen, und ich bin eilig seinem Ruf gefolgt. Aber die Unruhen verhinderten unser Zusammentreffen, und ich war gerade auf dem Weg zu Gouverneur Medineh, um den aktuellen Aufenthaltsort meines Mentors zu erfragen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest hesitates, glancing at his mechadendrites as if consulting them. Eventually, his vox-system responds:{/n} "I came here to carry out a sacred mission. My mentor, Archmagos Amarnat, summoned me, and I hastened to answer his call. But the rabble's unrest prevented our meeting, and I was on my way to Governor Medineh to determine my mentor's current location."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Techpriester zögert und blickt auf seine Mechadendriten, als würde er sie um Rat fragen. Schließlich antwortet sein Voxsystem:{/n} "Ich bin wegen einer Mission hier, die mein Mentor, Erzmagos Amarnat, mir übertragen hat. Wir hatten viele Zyklen nicht miteinander kommuniziert, und ich war sehr erfreut, von ihm zu hören. Aber die Unruhen verhinderten unser Zusammentreffen, und ich war gerade auf dem Weg zu Gouverneur Medineh, um den aktuellen Aufenthaltsort meines Mentors zu erfragen."

languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest hesitates, glancing at his mechadendrites as if consulting them. Eventually, his vox-system responds:{/n} "I came here to carry out a sacred mission. My mentor, Archmagos Amarnat, summoned me, and I hastened to answer his call. But the rabble's unrest prevented our meeting, and I was on my way to Governor Medineh to determine my mentor's current location."

languages.text: {n}Tekno Rahip tereddüt ediyor, sanki fikir danışırmış gibi mekadentritlerine bakıyor. Sonunda voks sistemi cevap veriyor.{/n} "Kutsal bir vazife için buradayım. Yönderim Başmagos Amarnat'ın çağrısıyla apar topar geldim lakin ayaktakımının yarattığı huzursuzluk görüşmemize mâni oldu. Ben de yönderimin yerini tespit etmek için Vali Medineh'e gidiyordum."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest hesitates, glancing at his mechadendrites as if consulting them. Eventually, his vox-system responds:{/n} "I came here to carry out a sacred mission. My mentor, Archmagos Amarnat, summoned me, and I hastened to answer his call. But the rabble's unrest prevented our meeting, and I was on my way to Governor Medineh to determine my mentor's current location."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tekno Rahip tereddüt ediyor, sanki fikir danışırmış gibi mekadentritlerine bakıyor. Sonunda voks sistemi cevap veriyor:{/n} "Kutsal bir vazife için buradayım. Mentorum Başmagos Amarnat'ın çağrısıyla apar topar geldim lakin ayaktakımının yarattığı huzursuzluk görüşmemize mâni oldu. Ben de mentorumun yerini tespit etmek için Vali Medineh'e gidiyordum."
